nodes.text: Around 1 ABY, Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan had her own office in her capacity of member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

In 1 ABY, the Princess of Alderaan Leia Organa had become in important figure in Alliance to Restore the Republic and, as such, she occupied a private office in one of the Alliance's bases. That year, around the time of the Wookiee Life Day, Organa and her protocol droid C-3PO received a transmission from Mallatobuck, wife of the Alliance hero Chewbacca, while they were working in the office.
The office of Princess Organa was rather spartan, containing only a desk, a chair, a personal computer and a viewscreen. The walls and the desk itself were painted in stern nuances of bluish-gray.
